hera.wallet.internal

Class LegacyWallet

  • java.lang.Object
    • hera.wallet.internal.LegacyWallet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountHoldable, KeyManageable, QueryClient, Wallet, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class LegacyWallet
extends java.lang.Object
implements Wallet
    Legacy wallet with poor interfaces. I hacked some apis of WalletApi to keep behaviors of legacy wallet. Remove after removing account interface.
